actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Ascencion M. Lujan, Noe Lujan, Sevedeo Lujan, Jr., Cordelia Lujan Long, Antonioa Lujan, Venceslao Lujan, Marta Lujan, Felix Lujan, and Tovia Lujan.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to certain individuals in full settlement of such individuals' claims against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Ascencion M. Lujan, Noe Lujan, Sevedeo Lujan, Jr., Cordelia Lujan Long, Antonioa Lujan, Venceslao Lujan, Marta Lujan, Felix Lujan, and Tovia Lujan.
